revised_title: Ship Technology in the 1980s: A Discussion on Future Developments
tldr: This article discusses the future of ship technology in the 1980s, covering topics such as shipbuilding, marine engineering, naval architecture, and marine transport systems. The discussion includes various aspects of ship technology, from operational problems to environmental concerns and technological advancements. Experts from different fields share their insights on the future of the British shipping industry and the global context of marine transport.
